document.full_text: a detroit prosecutor has filed a petition in district court to stop a florida fundamentalist christian preacher, who recently caused riots in afghanistan after he burned a koran, from holding a rally outside a large michigan mosque.
document.title: prosecutor tries to stop koran-burning pastor
lines_and_colors: a detroit prosecutor has filed a petition in district court to stop a florida fundamentalist christian preacher, who recently caused riots in afghanistan after he burned a koran, from holding a rally outside a large michigan mosque.
